channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report E-2023100285
item.description:
Report E-2023100285

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-30
  • City: BUTTE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0

item.title: Report E-2023100172
item.description:
Report E-2023100172

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-11T15:10:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-31
  • City: BILLINGS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the lid of one of the metal 5 gallon can of gas (un1203) had popped off and had released 3 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched .

item.title: Report X-2023070323
item.description:
Report X-2023070323

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-14T00:31:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-17
  • City: GREAT FALLS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1-2 gallon Sodium Hydrosulfide spill to tank car sides from unsecured manway (multiple manway swing bolts not secured). Stained sides and minor impacts to ground surface. No pooling. No release to water. OTS contracted to do clean-up.
